Net::DNS::Resolver::cygwin(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Net::DNS::Resolver::cygwin(3)

NAME

Net::DNS::Resolver::cygwin - Cygwin Resolver Class

SYNOPSIS

    use Net::DNS::Resolver;

DESCRIPTION

This class implements the OS specific portions of "Net::DNS::Resolver".

No user serviceable parts inside, see Net::DNS::Resolver for all your resolving needs.
